title: ﻿क्या प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी ने मालदीव में १०० करोड़ की धनराशि से मस्जिदे बनवाने का ऐलान किया ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: PM Narendra Modi addressing the People's Majlis in Male, #Maldives : I felt great to have announced today that India will contribute in conservation of Maldives' Friday Mosque. There's no such mosque elsewhere in the world like this historical mosque made up of coral. pic.twitter.com/FNabSjhBx0
